review: Its been working on and off. review: Had to re-enable the 2.4GHz band on my router just to get the Chromecast to connect to my network since it doesn't work with 5GHz routers. Also had issues getting the Chromecast to "wake from sleep", would no longer display picture, rebooting it didn't work, had to do full factory reset. I also don't find much use for this device, it kind of sits there like my Apple TV. Oh well.
